title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When an XML file is open in the scripted resource editor example, selecting the file in Navigator and choosing 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' does nothing. The file remains open in the scripted resource editor example.
EB: When an XML file is open in the scripted resource editor example, selecting the file in Navigator and choosing 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' should close the file in the scripted resource editor example, and open it in a new editor with the default text editor type.
SR:
1. Open the scripted resource editor example.
2. Create a new basic project.
3. Create a new file named test.xml.
4. Select test.xml in the Navigator.
5. Choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'.
6. Verify that the file is closed in the scripted resource editor example, and opened in a new editor with the default text editor type.
